name: python-dev
description: Python development environment with pip, venv, and common tools

scripts.setup:
# Update package lists
apt-get update

# Upgrade pip
pip3 install --upgrade pip

# Install common Python packages
pip3 install virtualenv pipenv

# Create workspace
mkdir -p /workspace
scripts.postInstall:
# Clean up
apt-get clean
apt-get autoremove -y

# Show Python version
python3 --version
pip3 --version

echo "Python Dev environment ready!"
